text: In an antique shop in Tiong Bahru, the shopkeeper regaled me with stories of his treasures. I found myself entranced by a 19th-century thangka, lost in its intricate details. His melodious French accent called me back to reality as he led me through another door. The rich scent of aged wood mingled with the equatorial heat, enveloping me in an atmosphere so vivid it felt like stepping into a movie scene.
really liked the chess sets they had and their antique lamps
